content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) for coal collection

### Iron Mining Operation at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) for iron ore collection

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (20, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0)
- Primary wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5)
- Secondary wooden chest at (22.5, 21.5)
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Output wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5) for copper plates
- Chain of inserters:
  - Burner inserter at (21.5, 21.5) moving items from primary to secondary chest
  - Burner inserter at (22.5, 20.5) moving items to furnace
  - Burner inserter at (23.5, 21.5) moving items from chest to furnace
  - Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving finished plates to output chest

### Unused Smelting Setup
Two unused stone furnaces at:
- (-11.0, 20.0)
- (-9.0, 20.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Belt Connections
- Cannot connect belts directly from wooden chests
- Use inserters to move items from chests onto belts

### Errors with Furnace Management
- Check furnace fuel capacity before attempting to insert more fuel
- Current issue: Attempting to insert coal into a furnace that already has maximum fuel (50/50)

### Entity Status Issues
- Multiple inserters are waiting for source items - ensure proper item flow through the production chain
- One inserter has blocked output - ensure there is a valid destination entity for items being moved

### Resource Management
- Iron mining drill is out of fuel - implement regular fuel checking and refueling system
- Some furnaces have no ingredients to smelt - ensure proper supply chain of raw materials
